record.field: ids = context['active_ids'] payments = object.browse(ids).mapped('payment_ids').filtered(lambda x: x.payment_method_code == 'issue_check') if not payments: raise Warning('No se encontraron cheques en las ordenes de pago seleccionadas') payments = payments.with_context(active_model=payments._name, active_ids=payments.ids) action = payments.env['report'].get_action(payments, 'check_report')
